apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji captures a loving embrace between a person and a man, each depicted with distinct medium and medium-dark skin tones, reflecting Apple’s commitment to diverse representation. A luminous red heart, glowing with Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading, floats between them, symbolizing profound affection and a strong romantic connection. The realistic lighting and smooth textures in this Apple rendering enhance the tenderness of the moment, making it ideal for expressing deep love and partnership.
